WorkItem.Description:
This may be simply a result of other issues in the Model, but just to point out this problem:
 
When selecting [Seal of Righteousness] from the Options-Abilities-Seal Choice dropdown,  the "balance' of Survival, Mitigation, and Threat seem fine.  However, if the Seal is switched to Truth, ... Threat becomes a huge issue (way over valued).
 
Load from Armory, US - Earthen Ring - Fyremaster  or any other Prot Pally, or even a blank ProtPally.

Comments.Message: Found this, will fix it as soon as I get home. Instead of *adding* the additional censure damage to the seal's base damage, I'm *multiplying* that damage. WHOOPS!!!
